founders_info: Alex Appelbe  is a mechanical engineer with a Master’s in Industrial Systems from Cambridge University.  He has 10 years of experience in the manufacturing sector.
Bashir Beikzadeh  has a degree in Electrical Engineering and a Master’s in Software Engineering from the University of Auckland. He has spent a number of years developing industrial IoT products.

company_short_desc: Metomic is data privacy made simple.
company_long_desc: Metomic  is data privacy made simple. Managing data privacy is painful for online companies. New regulations take months to understand, are costly to implement, and organisations still don’t get it right – risking millions in fines and ruining the user experience.
founders_info: Richard Vibert  has spent his career as a data scientist in the UK, US and Asia; culminating in the position of Vice President and Head of Data Strategy at Sotheby’s. He currently sits on the committee of the Data Protection Forum and received his M.Sc Maths from King’s College London.

Ben van Enckevort  is a serial creator, engineer, and the inspiration for Slack’s ⌘K. After starting his first software business at age 18, he went on to complete a Master’s in CS at Imperial and has since worked with startups and banks building software that has touched millions of people worldwide.

company_short_desc: MicroSec is bringing enterprise grade security to IoT and sensor networks.
company_long_desc: MicroSec  is bringing enterprise grade security to IoT and sensor networks. Their patent pending optimization techniques allow power and bandwidth constrained nodes to have enterprise level security as equivalent to any other Internet based system. MicroSec security design is network protocol agnostic allowing it to work on any communication technology.
founders_info: Vishram Mishra  is an award winning researcher and a certified information security professional. He has a PhD in wireless communication from NTU in the advance area of wireless communication. He has more than 8 years of experience in this area of security, network protocols and embedded systems.

Magzhan Ikram  is a mathematician with a master’s degree in applied mathematics and computer science from LMSU. He has several years of experience in the area of computational topology and deep learning on the platforms like super computers and embedded systems.

company_short_desc: Migacore enables travel companies to make sense of online information.
company_long_desc: Migacore  enables travel companies to make sense of the plethora of news, social media, and event information available online. Using state of the art natural language processing, we can accurately harness this treasure trove of information to optimise pricing and marketing decisions.
founders_info: Abheer Kolhatkar  has extensive experience in the aviation industry: he holds a BSc in Aeronautical Engineering, has worked as a commercial pilot, and also developed a pricing engine in private aviation.

George Brova  is an expert in information extraction, graph mining, and natural language processing. He has worked with big data technologies at Palantir and Google, as well as in revenue optimisation at Groupon.

company_short_desc: Mimica builds self-learning automations for digital work.
company_long_desc: Mimica  builds self-learning automations for digital work. We’re building software that observes the user for a few weeks; derives the intent behind the clicks and keystrokes; and generates the automation automatically.
founders_info: Tuhin Chakraborty  is a software engineer who led engineering teams at LinkedIn and Pandora. He studied machine learning at Stanford, and holds a patent for a supervised learning model he developed at LinkedIn. He formerly founded a tech startup, which he built and licensed to Google.

Raphael Holca-Lamarre  completed a PhD at the intersection of computational neuroscience and machine learning. Over a decade of research at McGill, ETH and TU Berlin, he developed the technical insights at the core of Mimica. He has won grants and awards, including Germany’s most highly regarded research scholarship.

company_short_desc: MOBILUS Labs is a hands-free, ear-free voice platform.
company_long_desc: MOBILUS Labs  is a hands-free, ear-free voice platform. MOBILUS uses breakthrough technology in voice recognition, bone conduction, and hybrid networking to deliver a frictionless voice experience for groups of any size, at any range, and in any environment. Nothing in your ears. Nothing in your hands.
founders_info: Jordan McRae  has a BSc and an MSc in space and ocean robotics from MIT and Stanford University respectively and has built complex hardware/software systems for companies including Lockheed Martin. He also has more than 10 years of entrepreneurial experience focussed on new innovations in voice communication in extreme environments.

company_short_desc: Moonsift is the first platform for shoppers to create their own digital twin for product discovery.
company_long_desc: Moonsift  is the first platform for shoppers to create their own digital twin for product discovery. We’ve built an unbiased platform that allows our users are providing us with an understanding of their tastes that is more detailed than anything that exists elsewhere
founders_info: Alexander Reed  has come from leading Accenture’s Innovation Programme and most recently managing the creation of an AI-led online buying experience for one of the largest FTSE retailers . He spent 2 years as a management consultant and previously founded a B2B and B2C sales business.

David Wood  applied machine learning in the discovery of new types of brain cells during his Computational Neuroscience PhD. Since his time as a Data Scientist at Ted Baker he has become passionate about utilising his skills to find a better way than advertising to match people with products.

company_short_desc: Morta digitises and automatically enforces construction rules
company_long_desc:
Morta  digitises and automatically enforces construction rules.Construction management teams rely on paper documents that define project rules. They spend over 50% 
of their time manually enforcing these rules and logging events. Paper-based processes are prone to human 
error, often resulting in delays and waste.Morta digitises construction rules. Our first product is aimed at design management. Managers define 
machine-readable rules on a web-based interface.Morta automatically enforces these rules and logs all events. By eliminating time, cost, and error from these 
processes, Morta has captured the interest of five leading engineering firms.
founders_info: Mohammad Shana’a  (CEO) spent five years leading digitisation efforts with the largest contractor in the Middle East. He focused on setting best practices for information management and led partnerships with technology startups (e.g. robotics, IoT). He has an MPhil in Engineering from Cambridge.

Matthew Morrison  (CTO) spent the last two years developing cutting edge applications and has an MSc in Computer Science from Imperial College London. He previously worked for more than five years in Investment banking and Asset Management, with a focus on Technology.

company_short_desc: Movel AI is the next generation robot navigation software platform.
company_long_desc: Movel AI  is the next generation robot navigation software platform. We use computer vision, deep learning, and sensor fusion for robot navigation. Our technology makes robot work in places that not possible before.
founders_info: Abhishek Gupta  is a serial entrepreneur holding a Master’s degree in Embedded Systems from NTU. He was a leading researcher at SUTD who designed self-driving bicycles and solar-powered robots.

Haoyu Bai  completed his PhD in Computer Science from NUS. He has more than ten years experience in AI and robotics. He developed powerful AI algorithms making aircraft collision avoidance systems 100 times safer, and self-driving car navigation system that can understand human behavior.

Zhan Wei Lim  completed his PhD in Computer Science from the National University of Singapore, where he designed path planning algorithms for efficient UAV search and rescue. He’s completed groundbreaking research in incorporating active learning with Bayesian reinforcement learning.

company_short_desc: Multiply provides interactive, adaptive personalised financial plans.
company_long_desc: Multiply  provides interactive, adaptive personalised financial plans with specific product recommendations across people’s entire financial world: savings, investments, protection and mortgages. We fully automate generating the plans by combining complex financial modeling techniques and machine learning and will make putting the plans into action totally seamless and free.
founders_info: Vivek Madlani  spent 12 years in finance at Lehman Brothers and RBS, where he built a trading business with £110m in annual revenues, designed and distributed products into the UK retail space and learnt all about the best aspects of advice.

Michael Curtis  has a PhD from Cambridge simulating black holes where he also led production and design at Varsity newspaper. He has been building web-apps since he was 12 and is an award winning communicator.

company_short_desc: Developing A.I. solutions to help music aggregators, production libraries and major record labels with curation.
company_long_desc: Musiio  develops A.I. solutions intended to assist music aggregators, production libraries and major record labels with their curation needs. Using Deep Learning, our product is able to listen to huge volumes of music in a short amount of time to find sonic matches, thus reducing the amount of time and effort otherwise needed by human curators. By increasing efficiency,  Musiio  will in turn increase accuracy by effectively “listening” through tracks that may be buried deep in large databases.
founders_info: Hazel Savage  has spent more than 12 years in the music-technology industry, having previously worked for Shazam, Pandora Internet Radio and Universal Music.

Aron Pettersson  is a data scientist who has spent 17 years writing code and holds a degree in physics. He previously built an A.I. that played the Swedish stock market that received 28% returns for 8 years in a row.

company_short_desc: myLevels help people see and understand what foods are best for their unique metabolism.
company_long_desc: myLevels  uses data from Continuous Glucose Monitors and Bayesian Machine Learning to model the very personalised impact that food has on people’s bodies. We help you see and understand what foods are best for your unique metabolism. People using myLevels for weight loss have dropped >10kg.
founders_info: Laura Douglas  has extensive experience building AI health products – including personalised medication, disease prediction and Babylon’s AI doctor. She has degrees in ML and Statistics from Cambridge and UCL. Laura started analysing her sugar levels last year, changing her relationship with food.

Iliyan Zarov  has 15 years of experience researching complex algorithms in quant finance and healthtech. At Babylon, he made Bayesian Inference possible at scale. He has degrees in CS and Maths. Iliyan’s health-hacking journey started with a bet to get from chubby to 6-pack.

company_short_desc: Nanovery is developing nanorobots to diagnose the world’s deadliest diseases
company_long_desc:
Nanovery is developing nanorobots to diagnose the world’s deadliest diseases.The world spends $4 trillion on chronic diseases annually, of which $1.2 trillion is on cancer. 
Recent advances enabled early cancer detection with just a blood sample. But this still takes 2 weeks.Nanovery develops nanorobots for early disease detection in 2 hours. We are starting with cancer but rolling out to other diseases. Our nanorobots can be dropped into blood samples and they light up when they capture a disease biomarker.We are in discussions with several pharma companies, have confirmed collaboration with Genomics England and are partnering in a number of clinical trials.
founders_info: Dr Mun Ching LeeLee holds a PhD in Pharmacology. She was the lead scientist and spokesperson for a multi-award winning iGEM team which competed with over 200 universities in the world finals at MIT. She has previously co-founded a robotics startup to automate cancer research.

Dr Jerzy KozyraJerzy holds a PhD in DNA nanotechnology and has an extensive background in complex AI. He has 
7 years of interdisciplinary experience at ICOS (leading UK synthetic biology group), where he worked at the cutting edge of computational biology: designing and building nanodevices using synthetic DNA.

company_short_desc: An intelligent industry-wide knowledge management platform
company_long_desc: The legal industry is struggling to protect their biggest asset: knowledge. Too much knowledge gets lost, and too much of lawyers’ time is wasted on searching for it. Narus is an intelligent industry-wide knowledge management platform for lawyers. With our proprietary knowledge graph and by harnessing the power of machine learning, our solution can distinguish in daily communication what is legal know-how and what is not, and then automatically categorise and logically connect hundreds and thousands of knowledge nuggets. This turns a burdensome and dull process into a real breeze.
founders_info: Flora Suen-KrujatzFlora Suen-Krujatz is a former Linklaters London knowledge lawyer with a decade of experience
Yiyang ShaoYiyang Shao is an award-winning programmer specialised in machine learning.

company_short_desc: Neoplants use synthetic biology to design plants for the future
company_long_desc: Neoplants use synthetic biology to design plants for the future.Indoor air pollution is up to five times higher than outdoors, and we spend 90% of our time inside. Yet there is no effective solution against the main pollutants (VOCs).We use the latest synthetic biology and gene editing techniques to develop the first air-purifying plants for your home. By creating this new category, we want to become the first legitimate brand of plants ever seen, so that we can put neoplants indoors, outdoors, everywhere.A radical product innovation, and a huge business opportunity leveraging consumer and societal trends.
founders_info: Patrick TorbeyPatrick Torbey is the CTO of Neoplants. He has a DeepTech background with a passion for taking the “fi” out of “sci-fi”, he completed his PhD in genome editing (transgenesis, CRISPR/Cas9) at ENS Paris and published 3 papers on the matter. He’s the best person to turn this fantastic vision into a reality.

Lionel MoraLionel Mora is the CEO of Neoplants. Business background with a product obsession, he spent 4 years as a Product Marketing Manager at Google, launching new categories at scale. That makes him the best person to market this new category of plants, drive our vision and lead this company.

company_short_desc: Improving the quality and efficiency of sleep using cutting-edge machine learning and acoustic neurofeedback.
company_long_desc: Neurobit  is building wearable sleep technology that goes beyond traditional sleep tracking and can improve the quality and efficiency of sleep using cutting-edge machine learning and acoustic neurofeedback. Imagine getting the benefits of a 2 hours sleep in 1 hour, imagine being able to design your own sleep! Neurobit makes it possible by combining the latest in sleep sciences with the cutting edge of engineering.
founders_info: Dr. Amiya Patanaik  has been studying sleep and cognitive neuroscience for nearly 8 years now and has published 10 papers in high impact journals and 2 international patents.  He has a Ph.D. in computer engineering from Nanyang Technological University and a B.Tech from Indian Institute of Technology – Kharagpur. Before joining Neurobit, he was working on improving sleep using neuro-modulation as a postdoc at Duke-NUS medical school.

Kishan  is an expert in bioelectronic design and soft condensed matter physics. He has worked in multiple world-renowned labs and universities including NCBS TIFR, Bangalore, NUS Singapore, New York University and CNRS Lab in Toulouse, France. He has a Masters and Bachelors degree in physics from Indian Institute of Science, Education, and Research. He was a research scholar at New York University in the Department of Physics from which he dropped out to start Neurobit technologies.

company_short_desc: Neurofenix makes rehabilitation affordable and enjoyable for stroke patients.
company_long_desc: Neurofenix  makes rehabilitation affordable and enjoyable for stroke patients. Our product consists of an innovative hand controller linked to a software platform. It motivates patients to practice the most critical exercises through their favorite games, letting them share their progress and support each other via an online community.
founders_info: Guillem Singla Buxarrais  is a prize-winning biomedical engineer and holds a first class Master’s in Neurotechnology from Imperial College. He has previously developed probabilistic algorithms in haptics and robotics publishing work on hand modelling in virtual reality.

Dimitris Athanasiou  holds a Master’s in Biomechanics from Imperial College and Innovation Awards in advanced mechanical design. He has experience in medical device development and clinical trials at Lightpoint Medical.

company_short_desc: Neurum leverages digital data to understand then manage behavioural health - in the real world, real-time.
company_long_desc: Neurum leverages digital data and machine learning to create real-world, real-time indicators of  behavioural health. Under the ethos of measurement-informed management, relevant tools and exercises are proactively prompted wherever an individual/ team/ organisation may be on the behavioural health spectrum.
founders_info: Megan LamMegan Lam’s research fellowship at Yale School of Medicine used digital data from connected devices to find patterns on depressive symptoms. There, co-founded emeritus Psychiatry Technology Group. She serves on the executive board of GIANT Health events, adviser for Shared Value Project HK’s mental health initiative, and consults on HealthTech developments.

Caleb ChiuCaleb Chiu is an expert in consumer applications, spending 8 years building top charting products as a full-stack software engineer. He has leveraged his skills from Bloomberg, to developing AI-enabled digital therapeutic alongside Imperial College’s Department of Psychology, and founding a government-backed mental health startup. He holds a Masters degree in Computer Science from Imperial College London.

company_short_desc: Nivoda aggregates the world's diamonds.
company_long_desc: Nivoda  aggregates the world’s diamonds. They can be purchased from anywhere in a single checkout and, because we consolidate international shipping, delivery costs are reduced by an average of 75% for our customers.
founders_info: David Sutton  has spent the past 12 years gaining insight into every aspect of the diamond industry: wholesaling jewellery to stores; working in a retail showroom; and local diamond distribution in South Africa. He also co-founded Taylor & Hart online jewellery store, which is based in London.

Andre Woons  previously co-founded Florin, which was rated the best peer-to-peer payment application in the Netherlands. He led a development team of 4 and was responsible for building the integrations with banks. He has the experience required to lead the development of the e-commerce, logistics and finance aspects of the business.

company_short_desc: Nodes & Links is taming the complexity of modern projects.
company_long_desc: Nodes & Links  is taming the complexity of modern projects. The lack of tools for managing this complexity leads to large contingency budgets being wasted. Our software uses complexity science and structured project data to identify complex risks and suggest mitigation strategies.
founders_info: Greg Lawton  is an Astrophysicist who spent the last 7 years of his career in BAE Systems (UK). He managed large defence programmes (£100M+), advised the Board of Directors on International Strategy, and owned key relationships with the UK Government and MoD.

Christos Ellinas  holds a doctorate in Complex Systems from Bristol University (UK) and was a Visiting Professor at Stevens Institute (USA). His research is award-winning, has attracted EU funding and been piloted across several large-scale projects.

company_short_desc: Nostos Genomics uses CRISPR to unlock genomics-based medicine.
company_long_desc: Nostos Genomics uses CRISPR to unlock genomics-based medicine.Worldwide, 300M people live with diseases caused by DNA mutations. Yet, most will never receive a diagnosis because genetic testing is ineffective in >70% of cases.Nostos Genomics offers SaaS that empowers medical labs to diagnose more patients with genetic disorders. Our proprietary ML algorithm links DNA mutations to disease, using exclusive data generated 100x faster with our cutting-edge CRISPR technology.We’ve assembled a world-class team of scientists. Together, we’re running pilots testing our prototype with 4 medical labs, including the largest lab chain in EU (€1.5B revenue/year).
founders_info:
Rocío Acuña HidalgoRocío Acuña Hidalgo is a medical doctor with a 
PhD in human genetics and a decade of experience in genomics. She has carried out award-winning research in prestigious institutions such as the Max Planck Institute and the University of Washington, mastering new technologies including CRISPR and NGS.

David GorganDavid Gorgan brings in experience from working in 4 leading healthcare organizations, initiating a multi-million Euro infrastructure project, and a degree in business, economics and law from the University of St. Gallen. He is passionate about solving this problem as he is experiencing it firsthand.

company_short_desc: nPlan’s software uses machine learning to analyse construction schedules to determine where the biggest risks lie and then recommend improvements.
company_long_desc: Construction projects are consistently and critically delayed, often because building credible schedules is a challenge beyond human capability.  nPlan ’s software uses machine learning to analyse construction schedules to determine where the biggest risks lie and then recommend improvements. We will become the global go-to method for construction planning that is both accurate and reliable.
founders_info: Dev Amratia  has worked for the UK Government where he led the national review on AI. Prior to that, he was a project manager with Shell and saw first hand how challenges in scheduling can make or break some of the most critical construction projects in the world.

Alan Mosca  is completing his PhD at the University of London, where he has been researching deep learning theory and optimisation methods. Alan has also applied his skills working in quantitative finance roles in the city for seven years.

company_short_desc: Nstack takes the functions developers write and deploys them to its platform in the cloud.
company_long_desc: Cloud computing has changed the way developers work, but getting your code in the cloud is still an absolute nightmare. Nstack takes this pain away. In a few simple commands,  Nstack  takes the functions developers write and deploys them to our platform in the cloud. Developers can then call them anywhere, in any language, without worrying about servers.
founders_info: Leo Anthias  is an EF and Y Combinator alum who came back to EF to solve this very problem because it was the biggest pain as the CTO of his previous company. He was the evangelist for this product before it even existed.

Dr.  Mandeep Gill  completed his PhD at Oxford focused distributed systems engineering and the very technology that powers StackHut. Prior to that he worked on several startups and developed pricing systems at Deutsche Bank.

company_short_desc: Observe applies computer vision and machine learning to optimise aquaculture farms, so that farmers will not miss any opportunity to maximise stock value.
company_long_desc: Observe  applies computer vision and machine learning to optimise aquaculture farms, so that farmers will not miss any opportunity to maximise stock value. Through interfacing with existing infrastructure already in place on a farm, Observe cuts feeding costs while getting fish out of the water faster and increasing farm production.
founders_info: Hemang  Rishi  won the Young Engineer For Britain in 2012 before getting his Master’s degree in electrical engineering from Imperial College London. He worked and published in the computer vision field  for 2.5 years, at companies including Laing O’Rourke as well as the Biologically Inspired Computer Vision Group at Imperial.

Pieter Fabry  has experience implementing reinforcement learning models on videos in real time. He has done research and publications in embedded systems, working as a nano-satellite researcher at the VLSI lab at the National University of Singapore, as well as building embedded systems for high speed financial option pricing during his Master’s degree at Imperial.

company_short_desc: Octeract solves today’s unsolvable optimization problems.
company_long_desc: Octeract  solves today’s unsolvable optimization problems. We are developing the first optimization software in history that can guarantee that the best solutions to large-scale, non-linear optimization problems will always be found. Our revolutionary technology employs a combination of massive parallelism, AI, and a niche field of mathematics: deterministic global optimization.
founders_info: Nikos Kazazakis  has 10 years of experience in optimization. He spent five years researching Deterministic Global Optimization (DGO) at Imperial College London, inventing the only known parallel DGO algorithms, and proving that it is possible to massively scale up DGO algorithms.

Gabriel Lau  did a PhD in molecular physics at Imperial College London, and has extensive experience in numerical methods and local optimization techniques. He has also worked in the financial industry, which involved the development of a large scale electronic trading platform.

company_short_desc: Omini makes blood tests 100x faster and 100x simpler
company_long_desc: Omini makes blood tests 100x faster and 100x simpler.Clinical chemistry is at the heart of medical decisions, but this essential tool is still limited by the time it takes to perform tests in the laboratory.This creates a trade-off between the quality and speed of medical decisions. We develop portable, multipurpose bio-sensing devices for immediate blood tests that combine the accuracy of lab tests with the ease of using mobile devices.Our first product provides doctors with better diagnoses before prescribing an antibiotic to reduce excessive prescriptions. We have already secured 60 general practitioners for a first pilot study.
founders_info: Joanne KanaanJoanne Kanaan completed her PhD at the Ecole Normale Supérieure in Paris. Her work is at the frontier of biochemistry and biophysics. With 6 publications in her field, she is an expert in the production and manipulation of biological molecules outside their physiological context.

Anna ShirinskayaAnna Shirinskaya holds a PhD in bioelectronics from the prestigious french Ecole Polytechnique. With two masters degrees in material sciences and electrochemistry, and an Erasmus fellowship, she is an expert in the design and fabrication of cutting edge bio-sensing devices.

company_short_desc: Onkolyze helps doctors personalise chemotherapy treatment.
company_long_desc: Onkolyze  helps doctors personalise chemotherapy treatment. Using data already captured as part of the clinical workflow, Onkolyze allows doctors to simulate patient specific outcomes for different chemotherapy treatments. This is achieved by unique combination of computer vision, artificial intelligence, and computer simulations. Optimising cancer treatment for individuals improves patient outcomes and saves the healthcare ecosystem money.
founders_info: Rory Wilding  has an MRes in Biomedical Sciences where he used in-vivo brain surgery models for pre-clinical psychopharmacology research. Rory has five years of product management and commercial experience working with early stage companies and corporate innovation.

Vivek Sheraton  has a degree in chemical engineering from IIT Kanpur, specialising in fluid dynamics. He has been working for the past five years on developing cancer simulation models to unravel the complexity of tumor growth for his PhD at NTU, Singapore. Sheraton has published his work research in high impact peer-reviewed journals.

company_short_desc: Open Cosmos provides customers with a development kit and simulator so they can build the technology at their own pace following its standard.
company_long_desc: Open Cosmos  provides our customers a development kit and simulator so they can build the technology at their own pace following our standard. When ready, we take care of all the paperwork, integrate it into our nanosatellite alongside other customers and put it into space. This approach allows mass customization, reducing costs from the millions down to a few hundred thousand.
founders_info: Rafel Jorda̝ Siquier  is an aerospace engineer with an MBA and background in both space startups and big industry players such as Airbus D&S. He’s supported by a team of four.
Han Lai  is an electronic engineer with 10 years of experience in a China-based supply-chain business producing high tech sensors.

company_short_desc: Optimal Labs applies bleeding-edge Deep Reinforcement Learning to create highly-intelligent autopilots for farms.
company_long_desc: Optimal Labs  applies bleeding-edge Deep Reinforcement Learning to create highly-intelligent autopilots for farms. The efficiency, reliability and nutritional output of our food system is a function of the decisions made by individual farmers – based on intuition. Our mission is to deploy AI-controlled farms to make those decisions optimally and globally – enabling a larger and longer-living population.
founders_info: David Hunter  is a recent member of the Machine Learning Lab at the University of Oxford – one of only a handful of labs in the world focused on Deep Reinforcement Learning. He previously ran the algorithmic trading quantitative strategies team at Deutsche Bank where his algorithms traded >5% of the European stock market volume.

João Abrantes  left his PhD in Robotics at EPFL to start Optimal. He has research and teaching experience in Machine Learning as well as a masters in bioengineering. He was the Portuguese youth pole-vault champion and is from a family of Olympians. Human nutrition has always been a key part of his life.

company_short_desc: PacketAI uses AI to automate IT Operations
company_long_desc: PacketAI uses AI to automate IT Operations.IT infrastructures are complex and generate TB’s of information every second. When incidents occur it takes time for engineers to analyse massive quantities of data, get to the root cause and fix issues – last year alone companies lost over 40B€ and engineers spent over 100M hours collectively to resolve IT incidents.At PacketAI, we leverage the power of Deep Learning to predict incidents before they impact customers and reduce the mean time to repair by up to 50%.We are currently running trials with a large Defence and Aerospace company and with a global Telecommunications giant.
founders_info: Abdelhadi AzzouniAbdelhadi has a MS and PhD in CS from top universities in France and Canada. He specialises in applying ML to large scale networks and has spent 3 years collaborating with companies like Orange, Huawei to build autonomous IT infrastructures. He owns 2 patents and his work has been published in top journals.

Hardik ThakkarHardik holds a B.E in Telecoms, a MSc in Business and has over 10 years of experience working for large companies such as Thales & Alstom. Recently he was the Regional Head of Operations for Uber in UKI and in the past has co-founded a VC-backed startup which today employs over a 100 employees.

company_short_desc: Panakeia makes cancer diagnosis faster and cheaper by eliminating theneed for multiple tests
company_long_desc: Panakeia  makes cancer diagnosis faster and cheaper by eliminating the need for multiple tests.Pathologist assessment of biopsy images is the gold standard for cancer diagnosis today. Complete diagnosis requires at least 4 additional tests done in separate labs. This takes 20 days and costs hospitals several thousand pounds.Panakeia’s deep-learning software enables doctors to get comprehensive diagnostic information from biopsy images they already have by fitting into existing workflow. Patients can get diagnosis from 1 test in 2 days at a fraction of the cost.We have partnerships with top cancer centres across 3 continents for data and trials of our patent-pending technology.
founders_info: Pandu Raharja  (CTO) is one of the first to develop state-of-the-art machine learning models to predict cancer outcomes from images. He has 7 years’ ML experience including cancer drug design for Roche. He has 6 top-tier publications, 2 patents, won worldwide ML awards and 2 masters from LMU and TUM.

Pahini Pandya  (CEO) has a decade of experience in cancer research including Post-doctorate from University of Cambridge. Her PhD focused on linking physical features from cancer tissue images to outcomes. She’s won several entrepreneurial awards and helped startups commercialise research.

company_short_desc: Papercup translates the voice track on videos so every creator can expand their reach to seven billion people.
company_long_desc: Papercup  translates the voice track on videos so every creator can expand their reach to seven billion people. People who create videos optimise for one metric: number of views. They need to reach an international audience because English- speaking markets are saturated with content. Papercup solves this by auto-translating the voice track on videos using a groundbreaking approach that combines Bayesian neural networks and speech synthesis.
founders_info: J esse Shemen  co-founded Deloitte’s startup incubator and investment arm and co-launched a new venture at Octopus Investments. He graduated summa cum laude from New York University Stern School of Business.

Jiameng Gao  is a post-grad from Cambridge with two Master’s degrees in speech processing and machine learning. He was the first employee at Calipsa (EF6), where he built the company’s machine learning and cloud architecture.

company_short_desc: PassFort allows companies to do rigorous KYC onboarding.
company_long_desc: PassFort  allows companies to do rigorous KYC onboarding without compromising on user experience or conversion. KYC regulations are a fact of life in industries ranging from financial services,real estate and online gambling. Current tools are slow to setup, expensive and provide a terrible end-user experience. PassFort can be deployed in hours.
founders_info: Donald Gillies  did an accelerated BSc in Financial Economics at St Andrews. He has a background in regulated markets: first in Private Equity, then at an Equity Crowdfunding startup.

Henry Irish  received his MEng/BA from Cambridge doing security research. He is also a talented full-stack developer, having worked for Edgespring in San Francisco before they were acquired by Salesforce.

company_short_desc: Pencil is the world’s first creative AI platform for digital advertising teams in brands and agencies.
company_long_desc: Pencil  is the world’s first creative AI platform for digital advertising teams in brands and agencies. Their platform generates culturally inspired ad copy and visuals for any product and audience, while predictively optimising for creativity, conversion and brand relevance.
founders_info: Will Hanschell  is a systems engineer with 8 years in creative services, most recently as the Asia head of consulting at Iris, one of the world’s most creative agencies.
Sumukh Avadhani  is an AI expert with 10 years’ experience in the field, from the Samsung Multimedia Lab to self-driving cars at Toshiba and anti-abuse at Google.

company_short_desc: Permutive doubles click through rates for publishers and provides personalised sponsored content, all on top of first party data.
company_long_desc: Permutive  doubles click through rates for publishers and provides personalised sponsored content, all on top of first party data.Every day, Permutive deals with millions of users for the world’s biggest publishers like The Metro and The Times.

company_short_desc: PetaGene enables smaller, faster, better genomics data.
company_long_desc: PetaGene  enables smaller, faster, better genomics data. The costs of storing and transferring genomic data are rapidly growing relative to the cost of sequencing, and threaten to overtake sequencing costs over the next five years.PetaGene’s multi-patent pending Bayesian approach can reduce the size of genomic data by up to a factor of five, reducing storage costs and accelerating transfers, while even potentially improving the quality and speed of downstream analyses.
founders_info: Dan Greenfield  received the BCS Distinguished Dissertation award for the top Computer Science PhD in the UK, building on his earlier degrees in Bioinformatics and Computer Engineering, and his experience leading teams in Silicon Valley.

company_short_desc: Phantasma offers Simulation as a Service to generate data-sets at scale for training self-driving cars.
company_long_desc: Self Driving cars are massively underperforming humans in urban spaces. Their AI models need a substantial amount of data to deal with edge cases which humans cause. At  Phantasma  we offer Simulation as a Service to generate these data-sets at scale for training self-driving cars.
founders_info: Ramakrishna Nanjundaiah  holds an MSc in Computational Mechanics from TU Munich. He has built city-scale simulations, ranging from pedestrian dynamics to high-fidelity physics on supercomputers. He has worked at top automotive, aerospace and scientific architecture companies and labs.

Maria Meier  holds an MSc in Software Engineering from TU Munich. She researched Distributed Databases at Oracle in Silicon Valley and Brown University, where a paper she co-authored won the Blue Sky Idea award. She then worked at startups in Berlin and built backends of 5 different databases.

company_short_desc: Phoelex provides optical connectivity solutions for hyperscale datacenters.
company_long_desc: Phoelex  provides optical connectivity solutions for hyperscale datacenters via transceivers that are 10X smaller, 5X cheaper, and 3X more energy efficient. This translates to significant CAPEX and OPEX savings, but more importantly much higher performance intra-datacenter data communication.
founders_info: Amir Nejadmalayeri  has a PhD in electrical engineering, specializing in optics and photonics. He did his postdoctoral research at MIT in areas of photonics and high frequency electronics, followed by industrial R&D at Samsung working on future generation of semiconductor devices. He has over 40 publications and patents, and his publications are cited 700 times. Amir is a Senior of Optical Society of America and a Senior of Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers.

company_short_desc: pi-top delivers the future of STEM education with made for makers and educators DIY laptop and desktop products.
company_long_desc: pi-top  delivers the future of STEM education with our made for makers and educators DIY laptop and desktop products. The combination of pi-tops hardware and software make it possible for any teacher, regardless of their computer literacy, to deliver fun and engaging lessons across the range of STEM and computer science subjects delivering results for students, parents and educators.
founders_info: Ryan Dunwoody  has a 1st class masters degree in Engineering Science from Oxford University and  Jesse Lozano  is a world class salesman.Since launching in 2014 pi-top is now in 28 distributors across the world including Best Buy, BT, RS Components, Barnes & Noble and several of the largest educational technology distributors in the world. Pi-top was awarded EdTech start-up of the year by  BETT 2017 , Europes largest educational technology trade show and is the only Operating System to be endorsed by  OCR the UKs leading exam awarding body .

company_short_desc: Pit.ai mine trading strategies through artificial intelligence.
company_long_desc: At  Pit.ai  we mine trading strategies through artificial intelligence. When it comes to processing massive financial data, machines have a natural advantage over humans. Our approach is based on a bleeding-edge, unpublished, proprietary machine learning technology, which allows us to achieve true alpha.

company_short_desc: Plotist is the first story-centric production management platform
company_long_desc: Creating stories is based on tools and techniques that are antiquated and create gaps in the production process.  Plotist  is an end-to-end solution that can manage the production workflow using the story as a context, from writing to post-production, becoming the first story-centric production management platform.
founders_info: Jay Cano  is a Computer Engineer, Sociologist and amateur writer who has worked as an engineer for IBM on an enterprise collaboration platform. His academic experience spans organisations, collaboration and social networks as a Sociologist and neurocomputation, AI and simulation as an Engineer.

Simon Altschuler  is a Computer Engineer from the Danish Technical University with vast industry experience creating complex web applications, including collaboration platforms and video streaming. He grew up in a family of storytellers, giving him a unique perspective on how stories work.

company_short_desc: Plumerai is making small machines intelligent by enabling them to use the power of deep learning locally and in real-time.
company_long_desc: Plumerai  is making small machines intelligent by enabling them to use the power of deep learning locally and in real-time. We do this by using a new type of deep learning, called Binarized Neural Networks.
founders_info: Roeland Nusselder  has two Bachelor’s in Physics and Mathematics and a Master’s in Mathematics from Utrecht University. He researched Efficient Deep Learning algorithms at the Dutch National Research Institute for Mathematics and Computer Science, which led to several peer-reviewed publications.

Taras Iakymchuk  has five years of industry experience in hardware design, a PhD in Electronics from the University of Valencia and a Master’s in Electronics from Wroclaw University of Technology. He has over ten peer-reviewed publications on implementing neural networks on FPGAs.

company_short_desc: Plural AI is  building an intelligent research assistant to solve the fundamental frustration of knowledge professionals: that search engines and databases only provide raw data.
company_long_desc: Plural AI  is  building an intelligent research assistant to solve the fundamental frustration of knowledge professionals: that search engines and databases only provide raw data. Our product allows them to pose questions in plain English, and delegate the drudgery to our technology.
founders_info: Camille Rougié  has eight years’ experience in finance (investment banking and PE). She spent two years at fintech startup MarketInvoice, launching new products worth £1m+ to the business. She holds an MSc in Economics and Finance from Sciences Po (Paris) and read Linguistics at Oxford.

Jaron Collis  holds a PhD in AI from Queen’s University Belfast. He left an award-winning research group to lead development at several tech startups, and has two decades’ experience building natural language and knowledge-based systems. He passionately believes work should be for machines.

company_short_desc: PolyAI is democratising conversational AI to give machines a voice.
company_long_desc: PolyAI  is democratising conversational AI to give machines a voice. We have developed a proprietary framework which collects annotated dialogue data at a fraction of the cost paid by our competitors. Our product is sector-agnostic, seamlessly scaling across different apps and languages.
founders_info: Nikola Mrkšić  was the first technical hire at VocalIQ, a machine learning startup acquired by Apple Siri in 2015. He holds a PhD from Cambridge.

company_short_desc: Presscast is a new kind of advertising that is organic and scalable

company_short_desc: Sensum Technologies uses advanced statistical and machine learning algorithms to predict and prevent preterm birth.
company_long_desc: Sensum Technologies  uses advanced statistical and machine learning algorithms to predict and prevent preterm birth.  Premature birth is one of the largest causes of infant death globally. company_long_desc: Sentient Machines  uses deep learning to bring customer understanding to the call centre industry. Leveraging recent developments in deep learning, our cloud-based speech analytics platform interprets and learns from customer call interactions, uncovering hidden trends, and enabling cost savings with real-time monitoring.

company_short_desc: SEPPURE is revolutionizing chemical separation and purification
company_long_desc: Using heat to separate and purify the components of large quantities of chemical mixtures is the most common and inefficient way in industry. The energy consumption of these processes such as evaporation and distillation accounts for 10 to 15 percent of the world’s annual energy use. SEPPURE created a chemically resistant nano-filter that does not use heat and separates chemicals at a molecular level. Our technology reduces the energy consumption of thermally-based chemical separations by at least 10X, and produces higher quality products.
founders_info: Mohammad H. D.A. FarahaniDr. Farahani holds a Ph.D. in Membrane Technology from the National University of Singapore, where he has developed chemically-resistant membranes and received the “Outstanding Postgraduate Research Thesis Award 2018” from the American Institute of Chemical Engineers for his contribution. He has 2 patents on membranes and more than 7 years of membrane-related experience. Dr. Farahani has published more than 30 prestigious peer-reviewed publications and one book chapter with 400+ citations.

company_short_desc: Seyo enables autonomous machines in extreme environments without the internet
company_long_desc: Seyo  enables autonomous machines in extreme environments without the internet. Even micro latencies and outages will be catastrophic. Seyo enables any machine to cooperate autonomously without clocks or the internet. Seyo safely arbitrates tasks offline, whilst being more computationally efficient than traditional GPS/LTE based systems, and more robust. Seyo is starting by reducing accidents in the harshest environment – mining, which represents 8% of global fatalities with payouts of $30bn in North America alone.

This will help manufacturers contain excursions that today lead to rework, scrap, warranty claims, and product recall. We envision a defect-free world that has realized the dream of Industry 4.0.
founders_info: Akanksha JagwaniAkanksha Jagwani is a Mechanical Engineer from IIT. She has worked with manufacturing giants such as Hyundai Motors and General Electric and has researched at Washington University and A*STAR. She also led digital product design and management teams at million-dollar startups, Embibe and Headout.

Avni AgrawalAvni Agrawal is a Computer Science Engineer from NIT. She has extensive experience in Big Data Analytics and Machine learning at D. E. Shaw and Visa and cleared CFA levels. She built platforms for petabytes of transactional data and filed a trade secret for a unique analytics model.

company_short_desc: Sparrho’s vision is to democratise science by combining human and machine intelligence.
company_long_desc: Sparrho’s vision is to democratise science by combining human and machine intelligence. We check 45,000+ journals hourly – create customised feeds (‘channels’) to stay up to date with the latest in science.

company_short_desc: Speak AI has built the world's most expressive and realistic artificial voices
company_long_desc: Speak AI has built the world’s most expressive and realistic artificial voices.Speak Ai is creating a professional tool for game developers that enables human quality voice acting on- demand.Voice acting in game development is expensive and time consuming, requiring: casting, contracts, scheduling, recording, directing, and editing.Speak Ai solves this and has 5 paid pilots with world renowned game development studios who are giving them proprietary datasets and unlimited hours of executive time to create the best solution.They are joined by Matthew Smith, a gaming veteran who audio directed the highest grossing entertainment product in history: Grand Theft Auto V.
founders_info: Zeena QureshiZeena has 5 years of experience working in tech startups having co-founded two previously, and having worked in a third growth-stage startup. Additionally, she has 9 years of experience in implementing speech and language therapy with children diagnosed with Autism Spectrum Disorder.

John FlynnJohn has an MSc in Sound Computing (awarded distinction, top three Masters in Queen Mary University) with 10 years of experience in film. John has worked with the world’s most famous expressive voices such as Morgan Freeman (voice of God in multiple movies), Christian Bale (voice of Batman), and more.

company_short_desc: The world’s simplest remote care service, enabling clinicians to talk to patients using video calling on TVs.
company_long_desc: SpeakSet  is the world’s simplest remote care service. It enables clinicians to talk to patients using video calling on TVs. The technology has been designed with a focus on accessibility for older patients and is multi-award winning in this category. The service is in use all over the UK and was the first deployed technology in the NHS’s flagship Test Bed programmes.
founders_info: Adi  studied engineering at Oxford University and has worked on supercars at McLaren.  Ewan  studied physics at Bristol University and was building back-end systems for the likes of Vodafone before the two met on Entrepreneur First.

company_short_desc: A payment platform that allows businesses to offer their customers instalment payments to increase upselling, conversions and basket values.
company_long_desc: The world is missing out on a lot of potential travelers and travelers are missing out on a lot of the world – the upfront cost of travel is the biggest hurdle.  Split  is a payment platform that allows businesses to offer their customers instalment payments to increase upselling, conversions and basket values.
founders_info: Dylan Tan  spent his entire career in the online travel industry, most recently as APAC Sales Manager at Skyscanner. There he built commercial partnerships with airlines and travel agents regionally – delivering S$2m annually
Vishvesh Suriyanarayanan  is a software engineer turned product manager, he has led teams in delivering great products, most recently at Fave in Malaysia.

company_short_desc: SquareMind allows robots to make skin cancer detection more accurate and accessible
company_long_desc:
SquareMind allows robots to make skin cancer detection more accurate and accessible.Skin cancer is a global health issue (~2 million new cases/y) and costly (US: $8bn treatment costs/y). 
Early detection is critical, but remains prone to human-error and manual, limiting its accuracy and accessibility.Our 3D reconstruction software enables an off-the-shelf robot to autonomously navigate around any body in real time. A full, high-resolution body mapping is automated in 5 minutes.Moles evolution and risk profile are tracked with AI over time. We have a prototype, patents and 5 pilots planned with leading hospitals. Our tech has a strong extension potential to other medical areas.
founders_info:
Tanguy SerratTanguy is an experienced software engineer coding since the age of 13. He developed state-of- the-art deep learning systems for medical surgery while at UCL’s Surgical Lab and for smart agriculture at Bilberry. Author of 2 patents, he holds a MSc. in Machine Learning from UCL 
(top 3%) and a MSc. from ENSAM.

Ali KhachloufAli started first in private equity, then as a fast- track consultant at Oliver Wyman in EU/Asia where he advised C-level boards on strategy and growth matters, including in healthcare. He cofounded an executive search startup that counts 40+ large companies as clients. He holds a MSc. from Centrale Paris.

company_short_desc: Deep neural networks and cognitive automation for accounting.
company_long_desc: Staple has developed proprietary neural network technology that can instantly read, interpret and understand the financial implications of documents – such as invoices, orders and contracts – then automate consequential accounting workflows. Their solution integrates with existing accounting and ERP systems to drastically reduce the time, cost and errors associated with traditionally human bookkeeping and accounting tasks.
founders_info: Ben SteinBen Stein  is a Chartered Accountant with 15 years of experience in accounting and finance. With past experience as a CFO and having worked with KPMG for almost a decade, he is intimately familiar with the financial challenges that businesses face every day. He holds a degrees in law and business and is a proficient full stack developer.

Joshua KettlewellDr. Joshua Kettlewell  is a PhD computer scientist with a background in machine learning and cryptography. He has considerable backend development experience and has been frequently cited in journals, technical publications and conferences.

company_short_desc: Analysis of human behaviour using AI and organisational psychology to prevent data breaches.
company_long_desc: StatusToday  analyses human behaviour using AI and organisational psychology to prevent data breaches. Knowing that people are predictable allows StatusToday to bring down breach detection times from several months to a few hours.
founders_info: Mircea Danila Dumitrescu  has more than 15 years of experience in security and large system architecture as Head of Security at JustEat and deputy CTO at Shopcade.

Ankur Modi  is an ex-Microsoft Engineer with expertise in big data protection and behavioural patterns who drove major deliverables within Microsoft Dynamics and Office 365. His past clients include Dell, eBay, Salesforce and LinkedIn.

company_short_desc: Production scheduling software for Industry 4.0.
company_long_desc: Synchronous  provides production scheduling software for the Industry 4.0 era. By combining proprietary simulation algorithms with cutting edge AI techniques, our software can help manufacturers improve efficiency by 30%.
founders_info: Jeffrey LeeJeffrey Lee holds a Bachelor’s degree from Harvard University and experienced this production scheduling pain personally while doing B2B sales for an oil and gas manufacturer. With his experience working at SaaS start-ups in New York, he saw an opportunity to reinvent the manufacturing software stack for the Industry 4.0 era.

Ulf BissbortUlf Bissbort holds a PhD in theoretical physics from Goethe University and completed a Postdoc at MIT, bringing over 10 years of simulation and ML experience. He created high performance simulations of complex quantum systems after training his first vintage neural nets in 2003, and focused on machine learning the past 3 years in various contexts.

company_short_desc: Teamflow unlocks the power of human intelligence in organisations to improve productivity.
company_long_desc: Teamflow  unlocks the power of human intelligence in organisations to improve productivity. Employees can’t easily access over 90% of their companies’ information or intelligence, as it lies with their colleagues. Teamflow integrates with companies’ employee data sources and uses deep-learning and optimisation to reveal employees’ hidden information and insights.
founders_info: Will Dickinson  exited his startup last year which built proprietary technology, extracting critical data for large organisations. He started his career as an engineer working at large enterprises, one of which was Veolia.
Ehsan Ghoreishi  holds a PhD in AI from King’s College. He has built content classification techniques for major telcos and has multiple publications on this topic in top tier venues.

company_short_desc: DVT diagnosis 30x faster, and a fraction of the cost.
company_long_desc: DVT is a blood clot in the deep vein of the leg. It kills more people than breast cancer, prostate cancer, AIDS, and car accidents combined. DVT costs Europe and the US over $18 billion per year because it can only be diagnosed manually by a radiologist.  ThinkSono  created groundbreaking software using advanced image processing and neural networks to allow any healthcare professional to diagnose DVT using a portable scanner and their own phone. This results in a diagnosis 30x faster, and a fraction of the cost.
founders_info: Fouad Al-Noor  has a Master’s in Electronic Engineering with Nanotechnology. He wrote his thesis on medical diagnosis and image processing. Before founding ThinkSono, he worked as a researcher at Imperial College London, focusing on medical devices.

Sven Mischkewitz  is an award-winning full stack engineer. During his studies, he focused on the field of Human-Computer Interaction, and he continued this work on projects for the Max Planck Institute for Brain Research.

company_short_desc: Building crime-fighting AI engines for CCTV to help retailers reduce theft.
company_long_desc: ThirdEye  builds crime-fighting AI engines for CCTV to help retailers reduce theft.
founders_info: Raz Ghafoor  is a prize winning Engineer from Imperial. He has previously developed machine learning algorithms for the human control lab at Imperial and a home security start-up.
Thomas Purchas  has seven years of software development and image processing experience, with prior experience developing intelligent CCTV software to prevent copper theft.

company_short_desc: TokenAnalyst is providing transparency to the crypto industry.
company_long_desc: TokenAnalyst  is providing transparency to the crypto industry. We parse and classify every transaction on the blockchain using cutting-edge unsupervised clustering techniques. This allows us to derive data-driven insights that enable institutional investors to fundamentally value cryptoassets.
founders_info: Sid Shekhar  has previously built enterprise -grade internal analytics systems at GE. He studied Computer Science at Cornell University and Machine Learning at UCL, where he won the departmental award for obtaining the highest overall mark.

Jai Prasad  has built scalable enterprise -grade financial technology at one of the fastest-growing fintech startups in the US, previously founded and took a startup from idea to 20K+ users and revenue, and has experience as a strategy consultant at Accenture. He holds degrees in Systems Engineering and Economics from the University of Virginia.

company_short_desc: Technology that can automate the work of any expert that’s paid to inspect things, in any domain, at near zero marginal cost.
company_long_desc: Tractable ’s technology can automate the work of any expert that’s paid to inspect things, in any domain, at near zero marginal cost. We exploit big opportunities in different sectors by harnessing their clients’ distribution. They charge per inspection, at an 80% discount to humans, for the same accuracy, and return results in seconds.
founders_info: Alex Dalyac  holds a Computer Science (Distinction) from Imperial.  Razva Ranca  studied Computer Science (Distinction) at the University of Cambridge. They both left PhDs in Machine Learning at these institutions to found Tractable.

company_short_desc: A space data network using lasers to transfer data at up to 1000x faster than what is currently available.
company_long_desc: Transcelestial  is developing the fastest, long-distance, point-to-point wireless communication network possible. It will be delivered as a space data network for terrestrial and satellite applications, which will use lasers to transfer data at up to 1000x faster than what is currently available. The network will be difficult to jam and will not need any spectrum pre-allocation or regulation.
founders_info: Mohammad Danesh  has a PhD in NanoPhotonics from NUS. He has designed and built photonic systems for A*STAR, Sumitomo Electric Labs and FUNSOM Institute. He has published 10 papers in major photonics journals including Nature.

Rohit Jha  has a degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from NTU. I have worked in The Royal Bank of Scotland’s FX Electronic Markets Team, on low-latency communications and highly scalable software systems.

company_short_desc: Creating the world’s first long-range, safe and efficient Wireless Power Network.
company_long_desc: TransferFi  is creating the world’s first long-range, safe and efficient Wireless Power Network (WPN). It will be used to power Industrial IoT sensors to reduce wiring complexity and high-power applications that will provide easy access to primary sources of energy such as remote and offshore renewable. All this is done through patented signal optimization and beamforming algorithms that will extend the range of Wireless Power Transfer (WPT) to more than 100 meters. TFi is revolutionizing the way we access power.
founders_info: Dr. Mohammad Reza Vedady : (CTO) He is an expert in convex optimization and signal processing techniques in near-field and far-field wireless power transfer systems. He received his Ph.D. degree from National University of Singapore (NUS) in 2015. From 2016 to 2017, he worked as a postdoctoral research fellow at NUS. He has published 16 papers in top IEEE transactions and international conferences.

Aashish Mehta : (CEO) He is a serial innovator that has 8 years of experience within a cutting edge hi-tech firm, National Instruments, consulting on system level solutions and representing ASEAN as its Industrial Internet of Things and Big Analog Data expert. He graduated from University of Wisconsin, with a Bachelor degree in mechanical engineering.Visit Website

company_short_desc: On a mission to transform healthcare through predictive analytics.
company_long_desc: Transformative  is on a mission to transform healthcare through predictive analytics. Our first product focuses on prediction and prevention of Sudden Cardiac Arrest, a condition that kills 6 million people annually. Using cutting-edge AI and analysis techniques employed at CERN, we’ve created cardioAI, an algorithm that predicts Sudden Cardiac Arrest before it occurs. Our advance warning empowers doctors and patients, enabling prompt intervention to save lives.
founders_info: Marek Sirendi  holds a PhD from the University of Cambridge and spent 5 years as a researcher at CERN working on the Large Hadron Collider.
Josh Oppenheimer,  an emergency medicine doctor, has a MD from the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai, an MBA from Cambridge Judge Business School and a degree in Health Policy from Princeton.
Marek Rei  holds a PhD in machine learning from the University of Cambridge and developed predictive deep learning models during his career at Swiftkey.

company_short_desc: Making customer service semi-automatic, though AI.
company_long_desc: True AI  is a London-based artificial intelligence company. Their algorithm learns how to reply to conversations, making customer service semi-automatic. This improves customer experience and saves precious service agent time for the hardest queries. Our algorithm is the result of years of research, building on top of cutting edge deep learning breakthroughs.True AI has expertise in deep learning, machine learning and business. Prior to True AI, the team has worked in deep learning research at Yoshua Bengio’s lab in Montreal and at Amazon Seattle. Their PhD publications have been featured e.g. in MIT Technology Review and NYTimes. The founders are graduates of IIT, UCL and CEMS, and alumni of McKinsey and Goldman Sachs.

company_short_desc: Automates UI testing, without needing testers to have expert coding skills.
company_long_desc: UI-licious  automates UI testing, without needing testers to have expert coding skills. Testing websites is highly repetitive and very expensive so thousands of websites simply skip testing before they ship. This results in 404s, faulty websites and lost customers.
founders_info: Shi Long Tai  worked as a full-stack web developer for 3 years and is an expert in complex user interface design. She graduated with high distinction in Information Systems Management from Singapore Management University.
Eugene Cheah  has been a serial entrepreneur and hacker for over 10 years/ He’s built over 100 large, scalable enterprise web applications with complex testing requirements.

company_short_desc: A comprehensive platform and developer tools to allow companies to understand, modify, compress and explain their deep learning models.
company_long_desc: Untangle AI  are building a comprehensive platform and developer tools to allow companies to understand, modify, compress and explain their deep learning models. This adds both transparency and alleviates huge problems for companies that limit wider adoption and trust of AI solutions. Our software allows for model auditing, which will become imperative as life affecting AIs hit the market.
founders_info: Dr. Jimmy Moore  completed his PhD in data interpretation and machine learning from the University of Manchester. He has built a career building the best in class real time AI systems and transferred his knowledge through consulting in Big data and AI for companies throughout the APAC region.

Naresh R Shah  is a deep learning expert with particular expertise in interpretable AI. He is a proven researcher with two Masters Degrees. Previously a Data Science Engineer at Procter & Gamble Co., where he lead a team to build and deploy solutions using Interpretable AI to predict and explain failures and quality defects.

company_short_desc: Safe, long-lasting, high-performing, low-cost flow batteries for large scale energy storage application.
company_long_desc: VFlow Tech  uses its unique IP to build safe, long-lasting, high performing low-cost flow batteries for large scale energy storage application. Our modular design allows our batteries to be highly scalable which fits in perfectly from households, micro-grids to grid level storage applications. We use a unique approach of industry focused research to deliver a long lasting and reliable storage solution based on user feedback and industry trends. In addition, our in-house expertise in renewable energy technologies means that we provide you with a complete “energy + storage” solution.
founders_info: Dr. Avishek Kumar  is an expert on renewable energy technologies with PhD from NUS, Singapore. He has more than 8 years of product design and manufacturing experience. He is serial entrepreneur with consulting experience of several MW level renewable energy projects across south east Asia and India.

Dr. Arjun Bhattarai  completed his PhD on vanadium redox flow batteries from NTU, Singapore. He brings few IPs and know-how, which allows VFlow Tech to significantly improves the current battery technologies and makes it cost competitive.

company_short_desc: Vine Health’s platform uses behavioural science and AI to increase the survival of cancer patients
company_long_desc: Vine Health’s platform uses behavioural science and AI to increase the survival of cancer patients.Patient behaviours account for up to 50% of their medical outcome; more than their clinical care and genetics combined.Vine Health’s AI-driven technology enables cancer patients to track, understand and optimise their own health through personalised behavioural nudges.Vine Health’s current distribution pipeline through hospitals and clinics provides them with access to over 1 million cancer patients.Through this platform, they gather highly contextual real-world data that enables pharmaceutical companies to accelerate drug trial and licensing processes, and to access higher reimbursements.
founders_info: Dr. Rayna PatelRayna is a medical doctor and neuroscientist (Cambridge, Harvard, MIT, Columbia) with a GSK- funded MPhil. She held strategic and commercial roles in government policy, tech startups and the Cabinet Office’s Nudge Unit, using behavioural science and AI to change patient behaviours through commercial products.

Georgina KirbyGeorgina is a data scientist with 6 years’ experience developing AI-driven health tech. She holds a Master’s (Imperial) and led GSK’s first data- driven clinical trial to predict patient outcomes. As Head of Data Science and part of the Executive Team, she was instrumental in Touch Surgery’s growth to Series B.

company_short_desc: Advanced Materials for 2x Battery Performance
company_long_desc: Volt14 is developing breakthrough battery materials which will double the energy stored per charge in lithium-ion battery cells, while keeping the size of the batteries unchanged. This profoundly impacts energy storage across verticals- with a 50% reduction in energy storage costs for electric vehicles (EVs) and batteries which are 40% thinner for mobile electronics. Furthermore, Volt14 materials can be used to make batteries with no required change in existing production lines and which will work in all existing and future platforms using lithium ion batteries.
founders_info: Arindam HaldarDr Adam Haldar has a PhD in Chemical Engineering from the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST), and is the inventor of Volt14’s proprietary material. He brings over 12 years of research experience in energy materials.
Animesh Kumar JhaAnimesh Jha has a degree in Mechanical Engineering from HKUST, and has worked extensively with developing novel nanomaterials and nanomanufacturing methods.

company_short_desc: Real time rendering and multi-user VR to enable communication of building information between architects and their clients.
company_long_desc: VRcollab  uses real time rendering and multi user Virtual Reality technology to enable communication of building information between architects and their clients. Architects now are able to take their clients on a tour of the building; and at the same time, make decision on the design and get approval on the project, right on the spot.
founders_info: Tee Jia Hen  is a Lead Software Engineer for 5 years and the co-founder of the biggest VR community in Asia. He also serves as the Deputy Chairman of the Singapore Computer Society VR/AR group.

Gong Yiwei  graduated from NTU and has more than 5 years experience in network and distributed system. He designed the Lucy Programming Language and CUDA parallel inverted index searching library during his time at university.

company_short_desc: Delivering a data-driven, pre-emptive approach to personal health.
company_long_desc: WILD AI  leverages deep tech, psychology and sports science to deliver a data-driven, pre-emptive approach to personal health.
founders_info: Helene Guillaume  has an MSc in Financial Risks from Audencia. She was a Hedge Fund Quant and Consultant for Fortune 500 companies. She’s a 100km ultra-runner, half ironman, ice and cross-continental swimmer.
Dr. Paul Harrison  is an AI Research Partner. He has a Computational Neuroscience PhD. He competes and coaches in endurance sports and was in the UK Triathlon team.
David Harrison , our CTO, has an MEng in Computer Engineering from Imperial. He founded a game development company after stints at Google and Gamesy.

company_short_desc: Using deep artificial intelligence software to revolutionise robotic harvesting.
company_long_desc: Xihelm  is using deep artificial intelligence software to revolutionise robotic harvesting. Hand picking is state of the art in greenhouses throughout the world; Xihelm’s mission is to build an AI that sees, understands and acts efficiently in the real world.
founders_info: James Kent  worked at Google in London and Silicon Valley for four years in modelling and analytics, and was granted six patents. He studied at London School of Economics, University of Oxford and Stanford University across Maths, Economics and Computer Science.

company_short_desc: Puts an end to fixed-size mobile design, giving designers powerful new tools to communicate with developers.
company_long_desc: Z eroheight  puts an end to fixed-size mobile design by giving designers powerful new tools to communicate with developers. Our platform keeps designers and developers in sync and has enabled our clients to deliver projects 25% faster.
founders_info: Jerome de Lafargue  is an award-winning computer scientist with a first class degree from Imperial College. He has deep knowledge of the app industry from his time as a mobile engineer at Bloomberg—where he experienced the problem they are solving first-hand.

Robin Tindale  has a first class Computer Science degree from Bristol University and has previously been published. He has a versatile engineering background covering—amongst others—web, mobile and devops. He met Jerome at Bloomberg 5 years ago and they have been working together ever since.
